title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Dec 24 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Dec 24 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, takes us back to the day Rush Limbaugh received the Presidential Medal of Freedom from President Trump. Lifelong listeners share stories of Rush's massive impact on their lives. We end with Rush's tradition of playing Mannheim Steamroller's Silent Night ("Stille Nacht") and his final holiday message: "Merry Christmas, Everybody -- I Love You All."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
